description: Restores a snapshot from the Recycle Bin. For more information, see Restore snapshots from the Recycle Bin in the Amazon EBS User Guide.

parameters.name: SnapshotId
parameters.description: The ID of the snapshot to restore.

nested_items.name: OutpostArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Outpost on which the snapshot is stored. For more information, see Amazon EBS local snapshots on Outposts in the Amazon EBS User Guide.

nested_items.name: Encrypted
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the snapshot is encrypted.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the EBS snapshot.

nested_items.name: Progress
nested_items.description: The progress of the snapshot, as a percentage.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time stamp when the snapshot was initiated.

nested_items.name: VolumeId
nested_items.description: The ID of the volume that was used to create the snapshot.

nested_items.name: VolumeSize
nested_items.description: The size of the volume, in GiB.
